amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds to authorize, approve, or implement a toll on existing free lanes on any segment of Interstate 4 in the State of Florida.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to authorize, approve, or implement a toll on existing free lanes on any segment of Interstate 4 in the State of Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.
